name: A Lorenz Attractor in 5000 Points
description:
Watch as 5000 points--each differing from the last's initial condition by just  .0001--obey the simplified convection model known as the Lorenz Equations:

x' = σ ( y - x )

y' = x ( r - z ) - y

z' = xy - bz

Color-coding from blue to red indicates difference in initial conditions.

Controls:

Left/Right -- Left and Right Arrow Keys

Forward/Backward -- Up and Down Arrow Keys

Raise/Lower -- 5 and 6 Keys

Rotate X and Y -- 1 and 2 Keys

Coming in a later release when I figure out how to make it work: Rotating in Z.
